# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `clspeop`
* Variable label: `The number of close people: friends, neighbours or co-workers`
* Domain: `Social environment`
* Value type: `continuous`
* Categories:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | Lack of close people


* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

# Data process
## Cuba

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

The study-specific variable elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `PFRDNUM`
* Label: `number of close friends`

* Name: `PNEINUM`
* Label: `number of close neighbours`


* Description: 
```{r assign1 cuba}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_cuba_w1_clspeop','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',variables=list('PFRDNUM', 'PNEINUM'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local1 cuba}
t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop')

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop, aes(x=factor(PFRDNUM))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of close friends") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop, aes(x=factor(PNEINUM))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of close neighbours") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `PFRDNUM=0 $ PNEINUM=0 into 0`
* `PFRDNUM>0 OR PNEINUM>0 into SUM(PFRDNUM, PNEINUM)`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 cuba, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$id)

t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- c(NA) 
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop)[1]){
  if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] == 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] == 0) { 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = sum(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i], t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i]) }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] <= 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] <= 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] }
}

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop, labels = c("lack of close people"=0, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1 cuba}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3])
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(clspeop))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("The number of close people: friends, neighbours or co-workers") + ylab("Frequency")
```

```{r crosstabulation1 cuba}

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `PFRDNUM=0 $ PNEINUM=0 into 0`
* `PFRDNUM>0 OR PNEINUM>0 into SUM(PFRDNUM, PNEINUM)`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 RM, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_RM_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$id)

t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM), "NA='-999'")
t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop)[1]){
  if(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] == 0 & t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] == 0) { 
    t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop[i] = sum(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i],t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i]) }
  else if(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] <= 0){ 
    t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] }
  else if(t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] <= 0 & t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_RM_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] }
}

t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop <- labelled(t1066_ds_RM_w1$clspeop, labels = c("lack of close people"=0, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To recode the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:  

* `f_PFRDNUM=0 $ f_PNEINUM=0 into 0`
* `f_PFRDNUM>0 OR f_PNEINUM>0 into SUM(f_PFRDNUM, f_PNEINUM)`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo2 UP, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_UP_w2 <- tibble(id=t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$id)

t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM), "NA='-999'")
t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop)[1]){
  if(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i] == 0 & t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i] == 0) { 
    t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop[i] = sum(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i],t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i]) }
  else if(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i] <= 0){ 
    t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop[i] = t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i] }
  else if(t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PFRDNUM[i] <= 0 & t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop[i] = t1066_UP_w2_clspeop$f_PNEINUM[i] }
}

t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop <- labelled(t1066_ds_UP_w2$clspeop, labels = c("lack of close people"=0, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```
